manipulators.description: Ctrl + W to delete word backward
Ctrl + U to delete to Start of Line
Ctrl + D to delete to End of Line

rules.description: Emacs keybindings: Word nav - Ctrl + B/F to move between words

manipulators.description: Ctrl + B to move backward a word
Ctrl + F to move forward a word

rules.description: SUPER layer: Left hand - dev tools, screenshots and tab/history navigation
FN layer: Left hand - Sticky Mods and Window/App Nav
FN layer: Right hand - Sticky Mods, alfred features, and page nav
SYMBOLS layer: Right hand - Symbols and arrows

manipulators.description: left_command to left_shift, send spacebar on tap
right_command to right_shift, send tab on tap
spacebar to right_command, send return_or_enter on tap
left_option to left_command+left_control+left_option, send escape on tap
right_option to right_control, send f16 on tap
right_command to right_command, send left_shift+return_or_enter on tap

profiles.name: Default (disable built-in kbd when CRKBD is connected)
